name: TRESemmé Blowout Products for Hair with 450°F Heat Protection & Frizz Control – Keratin Smooth Blowout Spray & Silk Serum + Protecting Heat Spray (3 Piece Set)
short_description: NEW LOOK, SAME BLOWOUT TOOLS: Stock up on the heat protection sprays (8 oz ea) and hair serum (3.3 oz) that shield your strands from heat damage while creating your next iconic blowout.
HAIR DETANGLER, ANTI-FRIZZ FORMULAS: The Keratin Smooth Blowout Spray and Protecting Heat Spray help detangle frizzy hair, leaving your hair smoother and more manageable.
HEAT PROTECTION SERUM: The lightweight hair serum, also infused with hydrolyzed keratin, adds lasting sleekness and shine to your perfectly smooth blowout.
BLOWOUT PRODUCTS REGIMEN: Apply sprays and serum while hair is damp before blow drying with hair dryer pointing downwards for extra smoothness.

COMMITMENT TO QUALITY: Since 1948, TRESemmé has been dedicated to providing professional-quality results to empower YOU to express your personal style. Our hair care products are Certified Cruelty-Free by PETA.

name: OGX Protecting + Silk Blowout Quick Drying Thermal Protection Spray, Heat Protectant Spray Shields Hair up to 450°F For Soft, Shiny Hair and Big, Beautiful Blowouts, Light Hold, 6 fl. oz
short_description: HEAT PROTECTION: 6-fluid ounces of OGX Protecting + Silk Blowout Quick Drying Thermal Spray delivers quick-dry heat protection up to 450°F while smoothing, softening, and adding shine for big, beautiful blowouts
FASTER BLOWOUTS: Lightweight thermal styling spray is designed to help speed up blow-dry time while smoothing frizz, softening strands, and supporting sleek, voluminous, long-lasting blowouts

LIGHTWEIGHT PRIMER: This quick-dry heat protectant spray won’t weigh hair down. Infused with hydrolyzed silk and quinoa to help smooth strands, protect from hot tools, and sup-port soft, shiny, bouncy blowouts
HOW TO USE: Spray evenly onto damp hair from roots to ends before blow-drying. Comb through, brush, and then blow-dry and style as desired for smooth, shiny, voluminous results
WHAT HAIR WANTS: Whether you need heat protection, smoother strands, blowout volume, or shiny hair, OGX styling products help bring out your best, fuller, softer, healthy-looking hair with every use
product_description: Give your blowout a silky, shiny boost with OGX Protecting + Silk Blowout Quick Drying Thermal Spray. This lightweight heat protectant spray helps shield hair from high heat up to 450°F while smoothing strands for big, beautiful blowouts. Infused with hydrolyzed silk and quinoa, the quick-drying formula helps prime hair for faster styling, reduces frizz, and leaves hair feeling soft and touchable. Ideal for all hair types and textures, it helps protect against heat damage from blow dryers, flat irons, and other hot styling tools. Spray evenly on damp hair from roots to ends before blow-drying to help decrease dry time and support a sleek, polished finish. For best results, pair with your favorite OGX shampoo, conditioner, or styling products to prep, protect, and style your blowout. Style as desired and enjoy soft, shiny, healthy-looking hair with long-lasting volume.

name: Hair Food Coconut & Argan Oil Heat Protectant Leave-In Spray for All Hair Types, 450°F Heat Protection, Sulfate-Free, Paraben-Free, Dye-Free, Alcohol-Free, Adds Shine, 6.4 Fl Oz
short_description: HEAT PROTECTANT: Have no fear of blow-dryers or styling irons. Hair Food Coconut & Argan Oil Heat Protectant Spray Blend helps to seal and protect your hair from heat damage up to 450°F and give it healthy shine (Due to thermal styling)

ONLY WHAT YOU NEED: At Hair Food, we believe that what you put on your hair is just as important as what you eat. That’s why our products are sulfate-free, paraben-free, and dye-free, providing your hair with the nourishment it needs without any harmful additives.
LEAVES HAIR SHINY: Designed to protect all hair types, this formula enhances healthy-looking shine while allowing you to style your hair freely.

DESIGNED FOR ALL HAIR TYPES: Whether your hair is straight, wavy, curly, fine, or thick, Hair Food Protectant Spray provides effective protection for every hair type. Simply shake well and spray liberally, section by section, before applying heat for maximum protection.

KITCHEN-INSPIRED RECIPES: Infused with the essence of coconut, this product offers a refreshing, delicious scent. Use it on its own or pair it with your favorite Hair Food shampoo, conditioner, or other styling products for best results and a complete hair care routine.
product_description: Can you handle the heat? Your hair can with Hair Food Heat Protection Blend. Infused with Coconut & Argan Oil, this heat shield helps to seal and protect your hair from heat damage* up to 450F and gives it healthy shine. Made with thoughtfully curated ingredients, it has everything you'll want to nourish your hair-and nothing you don't. That means no sulfates, no parabens and no dyes. Shake well and then spray liberally, section by section, before applying heat. It's as simple as that and you'll love how your hair looks and feels once you've achieved your perfect style. *Due to thermal styling.

name: CHI 44 Iron Guard Thermal Protection Spray, Nourishing Formula Helps Resist Heat Damage to Hair & Tame Frizz, Clear, 8 Oz, Pack of 2
short_description: HEAT PROTECTANT SPRAY: This hair-nourishing thermal protection spray forms a powerful barrier against the heat of styling tools. Safeguard your hair from damage & maintain its health. Beyond protection, this spray leaves your hair looking smooth & shiny.

CHI 44 IRON GUARD: Strengthen hair and enhance its resilience against heat damage from styling tools. This haircare system significantly reduces damage by providing layered protection and resilience from cleansing to styling.

CHI HAIRSPRAYS: CHI Sprays use ceramic and proteins to provide outstanding hair protection. Ceramic compound releases anions on the cuticles, which help to interlink the proteins into the hair strands imparting luster & strength for a healthy appearance.
HOW TO USE: Section your hair and spray it with CHI 44 Iron Guard evenly over dry hair. Start using your heat tool from roots to ends. Can also use on wet hair before drying.

CHI: Founded by Farouk Shami, a hairdresser allergic to ammonia who sought to create the first ammonia-free hair color & has remained committed to crafting the finest ethical haircare. All CHI products are cruelty-free, paraben-free, & sulfate-free.
product_description: Superior thermal protection spray that works from the inside-out, helping to protect hair from thermal damage and breakage with a weightless formula with no added build up. Helps to seal the cuticle and works to prevent future damage.

name: Marc Anthony Anti-Frizz Shield Ultimate Blowout Spray, Grow Long - Smooth, Shiny Hair in High Humidity - Heat Protectant - 6.7 oz | Grow Long, Smooth, Shiny Hair, in High Humidity
short_description: THE ULTIMATE SMOOTH BLOWOUT THAT DEFIES HUMIDITY: From Marc Anthony True Professional, get a frizz-free salon blowout with a smooth, glossy, featherlight finish with up to 72-hour humidity resistance*. For all hair types, transform unruly, frizzy hair into smooth, sleek perfection.

SMOOTHNESS THAT OUTLASTS THE LEADING SALON BRAND: Grow Long Anti-Frizz Shield Ultimate Blowout spray delivers frizz and humidity resistance that outlasts the leading salon brand, even in 80% humidity*. (*72-hour humidity chamber anti-frizz testing. Ultimate Blowout vs untreated hair vs leading salon brand)

UP TO 72-HOUR ANTI-FRIZZ HUMIDITY SHIELD: The heat activated formula creates a lightweight, hydrophobic anti-frizz shield around each strand, forming a virtual umbrella effect around your hair to lock in sleekness and repel humidity for up to 72 hours*; even through multiple washes.

PROTECT AS YOU STYLE: Doubling as a heat protect spray, it reduces blow drying time and protects against heat up to 450°F. Clinically proven to reduce breakage from thermal damage, it promotes stronger, longer hair. Infused with a blend of Caffeine, Biotin, and Ginseng, it conditions hair, leaving it softer, shinier, and healthier looking. This product does not grow new hair.

HOW TO USE: Heat activated formula. Apply to clean, towel-dried hair. Section hair and spray generously, ensuring even distribution from roots to ends. Blow-dry using heat, applying tension for optimal smoothness. For added styling, you may use a flat iron or complementary products once hair is fully dry.
product_description: Get the ultimate blowout that defies humidity. Transform dull, frizzy locks into a smooth, glossy, featherlight finish with up to 72 hours of frizz control, even in 80% humidity*. This innovative spray creates a lightweight, hydrophobic anti-frizz shield around each strand that repels humidity and locks in sleekness. The heat activated formula helps to reduce blow drying time and protects from heat up to 450°F. Infused with a blend of Caffeine, Biotin and Ginseng condition to help reduce breakage for stronger, longer hair. Cruelty-Free, Paraben-free, Sulfate-free, Phthalate-free. *Humidity chamber of testing over 72 hours in 80% humidity
